Description:
Adhere to the organization's established environment management plan for overseeing different operations and activities.
Keep real-time tracking of issues concerned with environmental impact to recommend appropriate measures.
Focus on designing feasible projects that contribute to safeguarding the environment.
Examine data on the organization's projects to design measures to eliminate adverse environmental impacts.
Document and maintain plans, requirement, protocols, permits and standard operating procedures.
Audit the development of company initiatives that aim at ecological damage control.Skills
Skills:
Experienced Environmental engineering professional with a keen interest in contributing to nature and ecological protection.
Familiarity with quality assurance, documentation, environmental rules, regulations and best practices.
Minimum Bachelor's degree holder in Environmental Engineering from a reputed educational institute.
In-depth knowledge of environmental standards and compliances like ambient quality, product specifications, and emissions.
Remarkable understanding of global health principles to provide suitable suggestions and solutions.
Portraying exemplary command of communication and interpersonal skills for ease of work and effective collaboration.
